short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Report deceptive or problematic election-related information you see on Facebook to the Election Deception Tracker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly report deceptive or problematic election-related information you see on Facebook with just a few clicks. Help fight the spread of false information online and ensure that all votes will count in November!  

Report any Facebook posts or ads that include false or misleading content about the election, voting-by-mail, and other voter suppression or intimidation to a team of election protection advocates who will analyze the information and push for its removal.

Capture content from your Facebook feed and report it with only a few clicks. Once installed, right click on a post title on Facebook, scroll down to "send to Election Deception Tracker," and follow the prompts.

Join the effort to stop the spread of false information online and protect our democracy.

Learn more details about the Election Deception Tracker from the nonprofit MapLight at https://maplight.org/election-deception-tracker
